articles.author: Vaishnawi Sinha
articles.title: Tech Mahindra shares plunge 6% after muted Q3 results; market cap falls - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In its quarterly results, Tech Mahindra saw a 60 percent decline in the net profits, with its shares plunging 6 percent on Thursday.
articles.content: After reporting muted profits across their quarterly reports, Tech Mahindra shares took a deep plunge on the stock markets on Thursday, falling nearly six percent when the markets closed. At 3:30 pm … [+1935 chars]
